```{r, echo =FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(shortestpath)
library(knitr)
library(igraph)
set.seed(22)
```
The shortest path package provides functions to create LaTeX code (tables and tikz plots) out of spgraphs.  

## toLatexTable
The igraph package provides a function "make_graph", which creates an igraph graph from a list of edges, or notable graph.

```{r,fig.width=4, fig.height=3}
g <- make_ring(4) %>%
    set_edge_attr("weight", value = c(2,2,3,1) ) %>%
    as.spgraph()

d <- dijkstra(g, "A", "C")
plot(d)

toLatexTable(d)
```
